tweets.text:
Bromley FC recently made the switch from a natural pitch to a synthetic one. But while the new pitch was a great move, it was clear that something was missing.

So how has a @Hunter_ind irrigation system helped the club's ambitions? https://t.co/aa4XQ2E0Bx https://t.co/1dgDquoWNH

@dhedges_gower @Against_3G Unbelievable! It might make players more comfortable but the South East is water stressed, where is the water coming from for @bromleyfc irrigation @thameswater? Where is the diffuse carcinogenic pollution going @EnvAgencySE? @OvergrownT @Mark_A_Goddard @MarcRedmile

Somerset‚Äôs lost soundscapes - no words - just incredible @WWTSteart @NESouthWest @EnvAgencySW @RachelBurdenEA @rl_musgrove @Qvsteart @somersetbirds @paulmarshall77 @SomersetWT @RSPBHamWall https://t.co/9KEDu9VHEg
#plastic that needs #water with a #carciogenic infill! Could this be the worst #sports #design ever? @janetmanning1 @Against_3G #pollution #danger #Children https://t.co/QLN5wwBh9w

Cannot recommend highly enough my previous employer @EnvAgency 
If you are ready for an Exec Director/Leadership level role in an ethical & socially responsible organisation follow @JamesBevanEA @johncurtinEA @JohnLeylandEA & @EmmaHowardBoyd  & check out current Exec vacancies üëáüèΩ https://t.co/WNvxpoTDvJ

The proof: 1 year post-restoration a previously barren, silt-smothered and fish-impassable section of the River Test now produces buckets of juvenile wild trout!
#ChalkStream
#WildRiversForWildFish #WillTravelForGravel

A @WessexRivers @WildTroutTrust and @EnvAgencySE partnership https://t.co/fnvXXeIHu0

I have two exciting opportunities to join my Executive Leadership Team and be at the heart of leading @EnvAgency in creating a better place for people and wildlife. Chief Operating Officer: https://t.co/O14DgMmEkw and Executive Director of Local Operations https://t.co/EzQWNw1xLa

We‚Äôre working with @DC_Police to investigate illegal waste sites and breakers, if you operate an illegal site
You‚Äôre on our radar! https://t.co/jmYmUt7SIn
Think you can operate an illegal waste site? Think again! You‚Äôre on our radar! https://t.co/LoxazLE8xX

Next week is the @somersetprepare online event. Book on the website for free training sessions: Crisis Recovery; Community Emergency Volunteer Coordinator; Looking After Yourself & Supporting Others; and Flood Volunteer @CommunitiesPrep @EnvAgencySW 
https://t.co/i5liQRMLlf

Painstaking research (often by #volunteers) results in robust evidence. 
The Making Space for Water project showed that moorland restoration: 
üí¶Slows water in heavy rainfall 
üí¶Raises water tables
üå±Increases bog plant species
üíöReduces area of bare peat
https://t.co/j5OOa4hF5m https://t.co/KtzEbxcFpj
#Shrewsbury #SpawningWatch good run of salmon today jumping all along the weir. @EnvAgency https://t.co/JnElXWFBKs

urls.title: Lost Soundscapes: Iron Age Somerset
urls.description: (Full Attributions are listed at the end of this video)During the late Iron Age, the Somerset Levels was a vast wetland spanning approximately 160,000 acres;...

tweets.text:
Based on the faunal remains from two Iron Age sites (with some creative license) I assembled this audio re-creation of the Somerset Levels circa 150BC. 

A soundscape of the past or the future? 

Full production here: https://t.co/31buGeaq6O

@Rebirding1 @gow_derek @IoloWilliams2 https://t.co/IIu8PCP4iR

A special find! This eel-like looking species is a jawless fish called a 'brook lamprey' which starts its life with no eyes or mouth! The fish can be found in rivers & streams, but has sadly fell victim to habitat loss in our waterways. @EnvAgencyNW @HeritageFundNW @SouthWestPeak https://t.co/CQ55nNgZ0O

It‚Äôs been a successful day of netting for the Fisheries Operation team. Large quality population of silver fish and a few double forgive carp! 

#fish #carp #lancashire https://t.co/Zv9jAdZZQO

tweets.text:
Wet wipes & sanitary products caused this sewer blockage in #Newark #Notts. It could have caused sewer flooding for nearby homes & damage to the #environment!

Always bin such products & only flush the 3 Ps - paper, pee & poo - down the loo!
https://t.co/nZMqVh9N3d #Unblocktober https://t.co/Qm2D87WqTm

@ConorMcG1one @Jamesxparsons @EnvAgency @UE I used sewage sludge on my farm for more than 20 yrs & found no problem with it especially in the lates form of bio-solids that had been though a digester. the only thing a farmer has to worry about is the phosphate levels of the land will eventually get too high & out of balance

Carrying out checks across #Devon today with @EnvAgency to ensure compliance with the #ScrapMetal Dealers Act & disrupt the trade in #stolen #metal from #HeritageSites, #Farms & #Infrastructure. If you're offered #Cash4Scrap this is illegal & should be reported to @EnvAgency. https://t.co/bH7ywe7od2

With the site de-watered it‚Äôs incredible to see the full scale of the structure. 

With the South Forty Foot Drain on one side and the tidal Haven on the other, ensuring these impressive gates remain resilient is an essential part of our flood defence maintenance programme. https://t.co/lQknuYDu3G

tweets.text:
Why 363? 
The famous ‚ÄòChipko Movement‚Äô was inspired by a true story of a brave lady called Amrita Devi Bishnoi who refused to let the kingsmen cut the trees. Her head was severed. 363 brave men and women sacrificed for the cause.
#chipkomovement #environmental #nature #protect https://t.co/sWBBOWxy7p
